solution.font: Suppose that [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] has standard matrix [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline]. [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is into if and only if there is a unique solution (in particular [mathjaxinline]\mathbf{0}[/mathjaxinline]) to [mathjaxinline]Ax=\mathbf{0}[/mathjaxinline]. This is true if and only if [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] does not have any free variables when row reduced.
